name: Pigments (Chromecore)
description:
__________

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam Theme: Joined Together

__________

Description:

In this puzzle-platformer, you will have to Join, separate, and mix pigments to pass obstacles and platform your way to the end of the level. Colors can only be affected by objects of the same color.

__________

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right    -    Move

Space    -    Jump

Enter    -    Switch Pigments

E    -    Join Pigments

Q    -    Split Pigments

Tab    -    Restart

__________
